If ` x ` is not free in ` ph ` , it is not free in ` -. ph ` . (Contributed by NM, 10-Jan-1993.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 17-Dec-2017.)

 If ` x ` is not free in ` ph ` , it is not free in ` -. ph ` . (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)
statement:
hbn.1 $e |- ( ph -> A. x ph ) $.
hbn $p |- ( -. ph -> A. x -. ph ) $.
